events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but the package still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated in several days and I'm very concerned about the delay.
System has categorised the issue as a Delivery Delay based on keywords such as 'delay' and 'tracking' found in the customer's message.
The customer support agent has been assigned to handle this delivery delay inquiry and will reach out to the customer shortly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order delay. I’m here to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status of your package right away?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and the package was supposed to be delivered to 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
Thank you for the details. I’ve contacted the courier service and found that your package is delayed due to weather conditions. We expect delivery within the next 3 business days.
I appreciate the update, but I’m still disappointed that the package is so late. Please keep me informed if there are further delays.
We will monitor your shipment closely and notify you immediately if anything changes. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
Just checking in to confirm that your order has been delivered successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since your delivery issue has been resolved, we are closing this case. We appreciate your business and are here to help anytime.
